column4: How can I bridge internetconnections on ubuntu 9.4? I want my internetconnection from my wireless to work on my other computers as well via a switch. My computer is connected to internet by wlan0 and I want to share from eth0 to switch.
did you tried yet to use the dnsmasq-base method ?
hmm i dont think so, ill try to google it to find more info about method:) Thanks a lot
glad to help, had the same problem, only for a router --> ubuntu --> pc lan.
